title: Women's Plus Size Off Shoulder Puff Sleeve Sequin Formal Maxi Dress Evening Party Gowns
description: Material: Outside is decorated with sequins,it’s not stretchy.Inside is with lining,which is 100% polyester,elastic.
Suitable For Prom, Night Party, Gathering, Dating, party, Wedding guest, Ceremony, wine Banquet, Anniversary, Valentine's Day, Honeymoon and other elegant and sexy occasions.

Please check the size chart in our detailed description before placing your order ,if you are Hesitating between two sizes, the bigger size will be better.And if you have any questions about the dress, please contact us freely.
Please wash by hand, no twist, air dry, no machine wash
